DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics single-dose Pegylated-Somatropin healthy male volunteer , collect scientific data design conduct subsequent study .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Study Pegylated-Somatropin Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject Age ( yr ) 18 45 Body mass index ( BMI ) 20 28 sign inform consent Known hypersensitivity somatropin component study drug Organic lesion heart , liver , kidney major organ History diabetes mellitus , cancer , autoimmune disease , genetic disease , mental disease Alcoholic , smoker drug abuser Blood donation , massive blood loss due injury surgery within 3 month Other condition opinion investigator preclude enrollment study .
